text: This is a list of cantons of the Allier department: * Bellerive-sur-Allier * Bourbon-l'Archambault * Commentry * Cusset * Dompierre-sur-Besbre * Gannat * Huriel * Lapalisse * Montluçon-1 * Montluçon-2 * Montluçon-3 * Montluçon-4 * Moulins-1 * Moulins-2 * Saint-Pourçain-sur-Sioule * Souvigny * Vichy-1 * Vichy-2 * Yzeure Allier Category:Allier
title: Cantons of the Allier department
